sentence: The S&P 500 and Dow Jones Industrial Average are slightly higher in early afternoon trading on Monday, while the NASDAQ Composite is lower.
Some of the most actively traded stocks include Halliburton ( HAL ) down 10.2%, Baker Hughes ( BHI ) up 10.1%, Apple ( AAPL ) down 0.3%, and Ford Motor ( F ) higher by 2%.
Good afternoon, this is Kristin Bianco with the Week Ahead Market Report for November 17, 2014.
In overseas trading, Japan's Nikkei 225 Stock Average was lower, down 2.96%, and the Hang Seng was lower by 1.21%.
In Europe, the FTSE 100 was higher by 0.26% and the German DAX was up 0.58% today.
In economic news, PPI is released tomorrow, Housing Starts on Wednesday, and Initial Claims and CPI on Thursday.
Companies releasing earnings this week include: Home Depot ( HD ) on Tuesday, JM Smucker (SJM) on Wednesday, Best Buy (BBY) on Thursday, and Foot Locker (FL) on Friday.
Join us on Friday for the Weekly Market Wrap and have a wonderful week.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
